h5&#123;font-size:12.8px&#125;&#125;</style><p><strong>这是我参与8月更文挑战的第 11 天，活动详情查看：<a href="https://juejin.cn/post/6987962113788493831" target="_blank" title="https://juejin.cn/post/6987962113788493831">8月更文挑战</a></strong></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-0">题目链接</h3>
<p><a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fleetcode-cn.com%2Fproblems%2Fevaluate-reverse-polish-notation%2F" target="_blank" rel="nofollow noopener noreferrer" title="https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/evaluate-reverse-polish-notation/" ref="nofollow noopener noreferrer">150. 逆波兰表达式求值</a></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-1">题目描述</h3>
<p>根据 逆波兰表示法，求表达式的值。</p>
<p>有效的算符包括 +、-、*、/ 。每个运算对象可以是整数，也可以是另一个逆波兰表达式。</p>
<p>说明：</p>
<ul>
<li>整数除法只保留整数部分。</li>
<li>给定逆波兰表达式总是有效的。换句话说，表达式总会得出有效数值且不存在除数为 0 的情况。</li>
</ul>
<h3 data-id="heading-2">测试用例</h3>
<pre><code class="copyable">输入： tokens = ["2","1","+","3","*"]
输出： 9
解释： 该算式转化为常见的中缀算术表达式为：((2 + 1) * 3) = 9
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-3">必要知识点</h3>
<p>平时我们习惯将表达式写成 <code>(1 + 2) * (3 + 4)</code>，加减乘除等运算符写在中间，因此称呼为中缀表达式。</p>
<p>而波兰表达式的写法为 <code>(* (+ 1 2) (+ 3 4))</code>，将运算符写在前面，因而也称为前缀表达式。</p>
<p>逆波兰表达式的写法为 <code>((1 2 +) (3 4 +) *)</code>，将运算符写在后面，因而也称为后缀表达式。</p>
<p><strong>对于波兰表达式和逆波兰表达式，去掉括号并不会影响优先级的计算</strong></p>
<p>逆波兰表达式的计算方式：</p>
<p>需要使用一个栈 <code>stack</code> 来辅助计算</p>
<p>从头开始遍历测试用例的每一个字符串，如果当前的字符是数字，就压入 <code>stack</code>；如果当前的字符不是数字（即为运算符），就需要从 <code>stack</code> 中执行两次弹出操作，分别得到数字为 <code>a, b</code>，然后将<code>b 操作符 a</code> 的结果压入 <code>stack</code>。遍历完成字符串后，<code>stack</code> 中只会剩下唯一的一个数字，即是运算结果</p>
<h3 data-id="heading-4">题目分析</h3>
<p>没啥好说的，按标准的逆波兰表示式的计算方式直接干他，碰到符号的话，就用 <code>switch</code> 选择对应的符号进行运行，<strong>唯一的细节点就是，题目明确要求了，除法舍去小数部分</strong></p>
<h3 data-id="heading-5">题目答案</h3>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> evalRPN = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params">tokens</span>) </span>&#123;
<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> stack = [];
<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> oprator = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Set</span>([<span class="hljs-string">'+'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'-'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'*'</span>, <span class="hljs-string">'/'</span>]);
tokens.forEach(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">n</span> =></span> &#123;
<span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (oprator.has(n)) &#123;
<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> a = stack.pop(),
b = stack.pop(),
c;
<span class="hljs-keyword">switch</span> (n) &#123;
<span class="hljs-keyword">case</span> <span class="hljs-string">'+'</span>:
c = b + a;
<span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">case</span> <span class="hljs-string">'-'</span>:
c = b - a;
<span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">case</span> <span class="hljs-string">'*'</span>:
c = b * a;
<span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">case</span> <span class="hljs-string">'/'</span>:
c = <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>(b / a);
<span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
<span class="hljs-keyword">default</span>:
<span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
&#125;
stack.push(c);
&#125; <span class="hljs-keyword">else</span> &#123;
stack.push(<span class="hljs-built_in">Number</span>(n));
&#125;
&#125;)
<span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> stack.pop();
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h3 data-id="heading-6">小小优化一把</h3>
<p>代码看着逻辑非常的清晰，就是有点，emmm，看着不太优雅的亚子</p>
<p><img src="https://p6-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/4600464fb81a45eca98fd3151665af3b~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-watermark.image" alt="图片.png" loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<p>复盘一下，就是这个 <code>switch</code> 看着太罗嗦了，那就直接给他改成 js 的 <code>Objec</code>，那么他的 <code>key</code> 嘛，那就是 4 款操作符咯</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> evalRPN = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params">tokens</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> caculate = &#123;
        <span class="hljs-string">'+'</span>: <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">b, a</span>) =></span> a + b,
        <span class="hljs-string">'-'</span>: <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">b, a</span>) =></span> a - b,
        <span class="hljs-string">'*'</span>: <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">b, a</span>) =></span> a * b,
        <span class="hljs-string">'/'</span>: <span class="hljs-function">(<span class="hljs-params">b, a</span>) =></span> <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>(a / b)
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> stack = [];
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> oprators = <span class="hljs-keyword">new</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">Set</span>([...Object.keys(caculate)]);
    tokens.forEach(<span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-params">n</span> =></span> stack.push(oprators.has(n) ? caculate[n](stack.pop(), stack.pop()) : <span class="hljs-built_in">Number</span>(n)));
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> stack.pop();
&#125;;
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>战绩嘛，起飞~</p>
